response.job_title: Researcher in 3D printing technology applied to the challenge of circular economy.
response.summary:
I am a mechanical engineer that turned out into Innovation field to explore meaningful technological ideas. Particularly, the application of 3D printing technology for a local recycling process in open labs.
Adept at working in a facilitator role in multidisciplinary teams to create solutions for the societal challenges of XXI century.
response.skills: CAD, Innovation Management, Leadership Development, Cultural Diversity, Engineering Management, Computer-Aided Design (CAD), Project Management

profile_positions.description:
Researcher at the Lorraine Fab Living Lab (http://www.lf2l.fr/) of the ERPI (Equipe de Recherche sur les Processus Innovatifs) Laboratory. 
I am responsible of the development of research projets related to 3D printing and circular economy.

Research projects: 
- Technical development of a Green FabLab.
- Improvement of the assessments of open source 3D printers
- FabCity Nancy
profile_positions.title: Research Associate

profile_positions.description:
Project: Internationalization of the company in the Colombian, Chilean and Peruvian markets.

 - Support for the creation of strategic plan.
 - Market research on mining, petroleum,  iron and steel industries.
 - Search for companies with similar profile business in these markets.
profile_positions.title: International Trainee

profile_positions.description:
Project: Design of a centrifugal casting machine to manufacture cast iron ASTM 40 cylinders.

 - Data collection for the development of the project.. (Benchmarking of technology and suppliers)
 - Support for creation of the technical drawings of product’s architecture, using CAD software.
profile_positions.title: Assistant Student

profile_positions.description:
- Organization of educational workshops related to science and technology.
- Realization of guided tours for all kinds of public in the interactive center.
profile_positions.title: Guide of the Interactive Center

school.name: Ecole Nationale Supérieure en Génie des Systèmes et de l'Innovation (ENSGSI)
